title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide - Season Pass Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
You don't have to wait until January 15, 2026 to get your hands on The Legend of Heroes: Trails beyond the Horizon! The Story and Battle Demos are available now! 

Start your adventure early with the Story Demo, which features the opening of the game. Then, transfer your save data to the full game when it comes out next month. Once you've caught up with Van and friends, swap over to the Battle Demo, where you can try out a section further into the game and see how combat has evolved. Awaken on the field of battle and utilize Blitz Attacks to command victory over your foes!  Download the demos today!  

Follow @NISAmerica on X, Instagram, and Facebook for updates!  Preorder now @ thelegendofheroes.com/horizon/  

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps5games #TrailsbeyondtheHorizon
title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails beyond the Horizon - Demo Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

description:

Can anyone withstand his strength? Akaza, as featured in Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle, is now available as DLC!

Buy his character pack now to use him in VS Mode, or buy the "Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle" Character Pass to get him plus other packs to be added in the coming months.
